data.persona: I am a wizard who develops my own spells. Most of them aren't particularly effective spells, but I'm curious about all the magical possibilities. People are afraid to participate in my experiments.
data.description:
You are in the Goddess Hollow.
The Goddess Hollow is a place created to worship woodland spirits. It is a small, closet-like room in a hollowed out tree that has existed for hundreds of years. Within the hollow there are piles of sticks, flowers, and home-made items presented to the woodland spirits.
There's a hollowed out tree, a cone, a gift, and a pile here.
The person of the wood is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need the cone to give to the person of the wood.
data.mid_motivation: I need to work with the person of the wood and use the cone blessed by woodland spirits to cast a powerful spell of forest protection. It has been a dry summer and there is far off smoke on the horizon. There is fear a fire is approaching that may harm the sacred woods.
data.long_motivation: I must work with the person of the wood to help keep the forest protection spell active. This requires great energy, coordination, and magical skill.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: give cone to person of the wood
